short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Printer emulator for zpl rendering engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Printer emulator for zpl rendering engine. The emulator is based on the http://labelary.com/service.html web service. You can configure print density, label size and the tcp server to listen for any incoming labels.

You have the ability to archive labels as image (PNG) or PDF file on your filesystem.
